thread.title: Peter S.
thread.title_full: Long Island Tax Resolution Services reviewed by Peter S.

author: Peter S.
title: Peter S.
text: I called Jim Greenen to get help with my tax situation that was very complicated and he was very friendly and helpful. He took the time to explain what to do and I felt very relieved. I was given great guidance and direction. The support he provided me was greatly appreciated. Highly recomended!!!!
